item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, March 29, 2025 at 11:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Veloren – voxel action-adventure role-playing in Rust (203 points | 32 comments)
2. All of the Commercials That David Lynch Has Directed: A 30-Minute Compilation (52 points | 10 comments)
3. CVE-2025-31160 Atop 2.11 heap problems (46 points | 21 comments)
4. Accessible open textbooks in math-heavy disciplines (128 points | 40 comments)
5. Paged Out #6 is out (136 points | 10 comments)

7. The Candid Naivety of Geeks (87 points | 40 comments)
8. Matrix Calculus (For Machine Learning and Beyond) (51 points | 6 comments)
9. Convert Linux to Windows (13 points | 7 comments)
10. Spark AI (YC W24) Is Hiring a Full-Stack Engineer in San Francisco ( | hide)
11. Lvgl: Embedded graphics library to create beautiful UIs (55 points | 9 comments)
12. XAN: A Modern CSV-Centric Data Manipulation Toolkit for the Terminal (19 points | 3 comments)
13. The disappearance of Gaia, ESA spacecraft will be turned off on 27 March 2025 (35 points | 7 comments)
14. OSS-SEC: Three bypasses of Ubuntu's unprivileged user namespace restrictions (34 points | 4 comments)
15. Vramfs: Vram Based Filesystem for Linux (73 points | 25 comments)

18. Show HN: Appear as anyone in video calls like zoom or Google meets (25 points | 15 comments)
19. Postgres Language Server: Initial Release (279 points | 46 comments)
20. The Wrong Way to Use a Signed Distance Function (SDF) (22 points | 1 comment)
21. De-Atomization Is the Secret to Happiness (27 points | 5 comments)
22. Free Output – AI output copyright status checker (23 points | 16 comments)
23. Typed Japanese (69 points | 25 comments)
24. Beautiful and Minimalistic Chrome Extension (11 points | 4 comments)
25. Plain – a web framework for building products with Python (269 points | 149 comments)
26. Everyone knows all the apps on your phone (6 points | discuss)
27. Decline of cash credited for drop in surgery for children swallowing objects (40 points | 34 comments)
28. Show HN: I implemented Snake in a tmux config file (38 points | 3 comments)
29. Making of the New York and Erie Railroad Organizational Diagram (18 points | 3 comments)
30. We hacked Gemini's Python sandbox and leaked its source code (at least some) (626 points | 127 comments)
